comments: Easy going teacher kind of boring sometimes but very good teacher just do the homework and practice exams on my IT lab and you will be good easy A and the projects from My IT lab it does really help learned a lot of brand new stuff from the computer really recommend to other students take him easy A
Cant understand a word he says. Dont bother answering any questions because they are retorical. Not sure if we are supposed to partcipate in class or not but attendance is mandatory. Boo this man!

This professor is boring. He is somewhat knowledgeable about what he is "TEACHING". Not sure what we are supposed to do during class. Attendance is mandatory and he keeps his student until the end. He doesn\'t give breaks.

The teacher is easy going but boring. He doesn\'t really care when you turn you homework in as long as you turn it in and expects students to do the Tutorial and 3 assig. on each chapter. He gives a test at the end of each sect., but if you have done your homework, in each section: word, excell, access, you should have no problem passing this class

He seems to be knowledgeable, but has a very monotone voice, which is very boring. When reviewing the next chapter, he has a bad habit of clicking pretty fast on the screens, your book would be more helpful, if you are not computer savy. Read your chapters and do 3 case works at the end of each chapter you should be Ok. He does give tests.
